    • Constructor Detail

      • TransmissionControlProtocol

        public TransmissionControlProtocol(AttackPattern attackPattern,
                                   java.lang.String masterAddress,
                                   int masterPort)
        The Transmission control protocol object constructor. It receives a attack pattern, master server IP address and master server connection port value and sends these parameters to TransmissionControlProtocolInterface constructor super class.
        Parameters:
        attackPattern - The attackPattern object with all informaton about the DDOS operation.
        masterAddress - The master server IP text address.
        masterPort - The master server connection port integer value.

    • Method Detail

      • writeMessage

        public void writeMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Write method overwrited by the Transmission control protocol interface. It writes a message into protocol and sends it back a response with data about this operation.
        Specified by:
        writeMessage in class Protocol
        Parameters:
        message - A text string message will be sended by the protocol.
